file.name: api_definition.yaml
file.content:
# Copyright 2021 Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 https://aws.amazon.com/apache-2-0/
---
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  title: "Private APi for the HTC grid"
  description: "Private API Gateway for HTC Grid"
  version: "1.0.0"
servers:
  - url: "https://restapiid.execute-api.my-region-1.amazonaws.com/{basePath}"
    variables:
      basePath:
        default: "/v1"
paths:
  /cancel:
    post:
      parameters:
        - name: submission_content
          in: query
          description: Job submission to the grid
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: ssful operationsuccessful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostCancelResponse'
        542:
          description: Invalid status value
          content: { }
      security:
        - api_key: []
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        type: "aws_proxy"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        uri: "arn:aws:apigateway:${region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:${region}:${account_id}:function:${cancel_lambda_name}/invocations"
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        timeoutInMillis: 29000
  /submit:
    post:
      parameters:
        - name: submission_content
          in: query
          description: Job submission to the grid
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: ssful operationsuccessful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostSubmitResponse'
        542:
          description: Invalid status value
          content: { }
      security:
        - api_key: []
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        type: "aws_proxy"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        uri: "arn:aws:apigateway:${region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:${region}:${account_id}:function:${submit_task_lambda_name}/invocations"
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        timeoutInMillis: 29000
  /result:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: submission_content
          in: query
          description: Job submission to the grid
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: ssful operationsuccessful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetResponse'
        542:
          description: Invalid status value
          content: { }
      security:
        - api_key: []
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        type: "aws_proxy"
        httpMethod: "POST"
        uri: "arn:aws:apigateway:${region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:${region}:${account_id}:function:${get_result_lambda_name}/invocations"
        passthroughBehavior: "when_no_match"
        timeoutInMillis: 29000
components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: "apiKey"
      name: "x-api-key"
      in: "header"
  schemas:
    GetMetadataResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        tasks_in_response:
          type: integer
          format: int64
    GetResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        finished:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        finished_output:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        cancelled:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        cancelled_output:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        failed:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        failed_output:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        message:
          type: string
        metadata:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetMetadataResponse'
    PostSubmitResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        task_ids:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        session_id:
          type: string
    PostCancelResponse:
      type: object

Error: parse: paths: /cancel: post: : responses: 542: unknown status code: 542
